name: Kusal Mendis
bio: Balapuwaduge Kusal Gimhan Mendis, known as  Kusal Mendis ; born 2 February 1995) is a professional Sri Lankan cricketer who plays all forms of the game.[1] He only played sixteen first-class matches before playing for the national side. He usually bats at number three in all formats. In November 2017, he was named the One Day International (ODI) batsman of the year for the 2016–17 season at Sri Lanka Cricket's annual awards.[2]
